title: Learning How to Communicate in Your Relationship with Kim Polinder
description:
This week, Maria speaks with relationship therapist Kim Polinder.


Kim is a relationship expert who assists others through individual and couples counseling. Kim was born in South Korea and adopted when she was a baby. Her personal journey involved navigating abandonment issues, alcohol addiction, and barriers to emotional intimacy. Kim’s studies of eastern and western approaches to healing have given her a well-informed perspective on the root of suffering. Kim now teaches others tools for communication, conflict resolution, and building long-term relationships.

 

Follow Kim…

Instagram: https://instagram.com/kp_counseling 

TikTok: https://tiktok.com/@kp_counseling108 

Twitter: https://twitter.com/kpcounseling108

Web: https://kimpolinder.com/


Follow Maria on Instagram for more dating and relationship content: http://instagram.com/matchmakermaria 


Want to work with Maria? Book a Dating Strategy call with a member of her team and learn more about her matchmaking and coaching programs. https://calendly.com/felix-louie 


Want to join Maria on her next retreat? #Escape2Paros 2023 registration is officially open. http://agapeescapes.com
author: maria@agapematch.com (Maria Avgitidis)
